sentences.sentence: There were enough pumas out West.
sentences.translation: 在西部有足够多的美洲豹。

sentences.sentence: When times are lean, pumas will take their chances with other prey.
sentences.translation: 食物匮乏的时候，美洲狮也会寻找机会捕捉其他猎物。

sentences.sentence: More than two dozen live here in cages, including jaguars, pumas and ocelots.
sentences.translation: 这里有近三十只大型猫科动物生活在笼子里，有美洲虎、美洲狮、还有豹猫。
